name: readycloud-nvram-config
description: The ReadyCloud service sets multiple NVRAM variables in the env_nvram.sh script, including cloud service URLs, path configurations, and log level settings. These configurations are used for device cloud registration and remote access functionality.
code_snippet:
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_fetch_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/device/entry"
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_hook_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/device/hook"
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_upload_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/directio"
notes: These configurations may contain sensitive service endpoint URLs and path information

name: leafp2p-nvram-config
description: The set_nvram.sh script configures multiple NVRAM variables related to the leafp2p remote access service, including service switch, port settings, and debug level. These configurations may affect the device's remote access capability.

name: remote-init-nvram-access
description: The remote.sh startup script accesses multiple leafp2p-related NVRAM variables, including service URLs, debug levels, and firewall settings. The script provides default values and commits them to NVRAM when the variables are unset.
notes: Contains multiple remote service URLs and port configurations, which may impact device security
